Daniel Karaj

Lighting Design

Whilst at university I did lighting design for a number of shows at our student theatre culminating in a sold out run of the Footlights Pantomime. I enjoyed being able to sculpt with light and convey feeling and mood to the audience. I focused on creating graphic, striking scenes with vivid colour over realism.

The photography in this section is courtesy of Johannes Hjorth.

2014 - 15
